field.name: summary
field.value: Remove Session requirements to lazy load BelongsTo associations

field.name: description
field.value:
Attached is a patch to implement a custom ByteCode. It will manage the Session when lazy loading BelongsTo associations. With it, a BelongsTo will not trigger a LazyInitialization Exception, even if it is outside of a SessionScope.
I hope to provide similar functionality for lazy properties and collections in the future.
I discussed this functionality in [a thread|http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-users/browse_frm/thread/83b1a1d17a46fcec] on the user list. I know this is a big addition, please let me know if I can do anything else to help get this included.
